languages.text: Чтобы отправить ремонтные команды на тушение пожара, офицерам пришлось с оружием в руках отгонять матросов от спасательных шаттлов. Зачинщиков позорной попытки бегства расстреливали на месте.

To send repair teams to put out the fire, the officers had to drive the voidsmen away from the rescue shuttles with weapons in their hands. The instigators of the shameful attempt to escape were shot on the spot.
languages.original_text: Чтобы отправить ремонтные команды на тушение пожара, офицерам пришлось с оружием в руках отгонять матросов от спасательных шаттлов. Зачинщиков позорной попытки бегства расстреливали на месте.

traits.locale_text: To send repair teams to put out the fire, the officers had to drive the sailors away from the rescue shuttles with weapons in their hands. The instigators of the shameful attempt to escape were shot on the spot.

To send repair teams to put out the fire, the officers had to drive the voidsmen away from the rescue shuttles with weapons in their hands. The instigators of the shameful attempt to escape were shot on the spot.

To send repair teams to put out the fire, the officers had to drive the voidsmen away from the rescue shuttles with weapons in their hands. The instigators of the shameful attempt to escape were shot on the spot.

To send repair teams to put out the fire, the officers had to drive the voidsmen away from the rescue shuttles with weapons in their hands. The instigators of the shameful attempt to escape were shot on the spot.

languages.text: 消火のために修理チームを派遣するため、士官たちは武器を片手にヴォイズマンたちを救助シャトルから追い払わなければならなかった。逃亡を試みた恥ずべき行為の扇動者たちは即座に射殺された。
languages.original_text: To send repair teams to put out the fire, the officers had to drive the voidsmen away from the rescue shuttles with weapons in their hands. The instigators of the shameful attempt to escape were shot on the spot.

traits.locale_text: 消火のために修理チームを派遣するため、士官たちは武器を片手にヴォイズマンたちを救助シャトルから追い払わなければならなかった。逃亡を試みた恥ずべき行為の扇動者たちは即座に射殺された。

languages.text: Les officiers ont dû recourir à la force pour dissuader les cosmomarins d'approcher des navettes d'évacuation et former des équipes pour éteindre l'incendie. Les personnes qui ont tenté de se soustraire à leurs responsabilités en fuyant ont été abattues sur place.
languages.original_text: To send repair teams to put out the fire, the officers had to drive the voidsmen away from the rescue shuttles with weapons in their hands. The instigators of the shameful attempt to escape were shot on the spot.

traits.locale_text: Les officiers ont dû recourir à la force pour dissuader les cosmomarins d'approcher des navettes d'évacuation et former des équipes pour éteindre l'incendie. Les personnes qui ont tenté de se soustraire à leurs responsabilités en fuyant ont été abattues sur place.

languages.text: 为了让维修队成员赶紧灭火，军官不得不手持武器，制止船员登上救援穿梭机。所有企图逃跑的可耻之徒都被当场击毙。
languages.original_text: To send repair teams to put out the fire, the officers had to drive the voidsmen away from the rescue shuttles with weapons in their hands. The instigators of the shameful attempt to escape were shot on the spot.

traits.locale_text: 为了让维修队成员赶紧灭火，军官不得不手持武器，制止船员登上救援穿梭机。所有企图逃跑的可耻之徒都被当场击毙。

languages.text: Para que los equipos de reparación pudieran apagar el incendio, los oficiales tuvieron que armarse y conducir a los infantes del vacío desde las lanzaderas de rescate. Los instigadores de aquel vergonzoso intento de fuga fueron fusilados en el acto.
languages.original_text: To send repair teams to put out the fire, the officers had to drive the voidsmen away from the rescue shuttles with weapons in their hands. The instigators of the shameful attempt to escape were shot on the spot.

traits.locale_text: Para que los equipos de reparación pudieran apagar el incendio, los oficiales tuvieron que armarse y conducir a los infantes del vacío desde las lanzaderas de rescate. Los instigadores de aquel vergonzoso intento de fuga fueron fusilados en el acto.

languages.text: Um Löschtrupps zu schicken, mussten die Offiziere die Raumfahrer mit Waffen in den Händen von den Rettungsshuttles wegtreiben. Die Rädelsführer des schändlichen Fluchtversuchs wurden auf der Stelle erschossen.
languages.original_text: To send repair teams to put out the fire, the officers had to drive the voidsmen away from the rescue shuttles with weapons in their hands. The instigators of the shameful attempt to escape were shot on the spot.

traits.locale_text: Um Löschtrupps zu schicken, mussten die Offiziere die Raumfahrer mit Waffen in den Händen von den Rettungsshuttles wegtreiben. Die Rädelsführer des schändlichen Fluchtversuchs wurden auf der Stelle erschossen.

languages.text: Subaylar, onarım ekiplerini yangını söndürmeye gönderebilmek için uçsuz erlerini kurtarma mekiklerinden silah zoruyla uzaklaştırmak zorunda kaldı. Bu utanç verici kaçış teşebbüsünün azmettiricileri, oracıkta vuruldu.
languages.original_text: To send repair teams to put out the fire, the officers had to drive the voidsmen away from the rescue shuttles with weapons in their hands. The instigators of the shameful attempt to escape were shot on the spot.

traits.locale_text: Subaylar, onarım ekiplerini yangını söndürmeye gönderebilmek için uçsuz erlerini kurtarma mekiklerinden silah zoruyla uzak tutmak zorunda kaldı. Bu utanç verici kaçış teşebbüsünün azmettiricileri, görüldükleri yerde vuruldu.
